name: podamShouldFillRecursivePojos

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.RecursivePojo
Then the pojo uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.RecursivePojo@18fb506 must be of the type class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.RecursivePojo
Then all the POJOs in the recursive hierarchy should be valid

featureTag.name: Basic types/Podam factory basic types test

title: Podam should fill recursive POJOs correctly, including all their fields

tags.name: Basic types/Podam factory basic types test
